name: emojitwo/emojitwo
description: Emojis in SVG and PNG format based upon Emojione. Emojitwo is a complete set of emojis (as of mid-2016: Unicode 9.0, Emoji 3.0) designed for the web.

suggest.emojione/assets: More up-to-date emoji set with a more restrictive license and without SVGs.
suggest.emojione/emojione: A set of libraries to make using emoji on your websites easier.
suggest.iamcal/php-emoji: Uses iamcal/emoji-data to display emojis from most major vendors.
